description: Kanae attacks Yoriko; Abuto orders her back and explains Yoriko the choice she has. Misato offers Asumi a career as singer and orders her to accompany T.L.System to learn the basics. Kiriko is fuming; Asumi suggests she should give up on Kyouta. Yoriko has cut her ties with Rumiko and signs a contract as actress with Abuto who claims she can be closer to Kyouta this way. Yoriko observes Kanae kissing Kyouta after dinner - and Sarasvati awakes.
